item.title: Tech Startups Are Flooding Kenya With Apps Offering High-Interest Loans [Bloomberg]
item.description: Tech Startups Are Flooding Kenya With Apps Offering High-Interest Loans. Zeke Faux. Bloomberg New Economy. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/features/2020-02-12/tech-startups-are-flooding-kenya-with-apps-offering-high-interest-loans. https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=22307002. Tala's Version of Events Empowering female entrepreneurs around the world - Mexico, Philippines, India & Kenya. 69% of global adult population is not covered by credit bureaus. Using non-traditional data, more people can get scored. Credit brings opportunity and choice. We help people be in control of their finances. The Situation on the Ground Tala generates credit ratings from phone data: text messages, location data, contacts, and call logs.

item.title: [Summary] (Sivan) Innovation Africa & Water Availability
item.description: Innovation Africa & Water Availability. Sivan (InnoAfrica). Talks at The Keller Center. Oct 1, 2018. Bring in Israeli solar panels and drip irrigation. Pump water from the large reservoirs below. Cost $7,000. Adapting to community: 6-8 weeks on committees, bank accounts; mobile charging stations and barbershops using solar panels for sustainability. Can't sell the water, but you can subsidize it with complementary products. Set up remote monitoring with real time stats in order to schedule maintenance.
